abstract: If ever there was a designer-to-brand match up that was made of perfectly complementary parts, it would be the appointment of Manish Arora as creative director at Paco Rabanne this season.
snippet: If ever there was a designer-to-brand match up that was made of perfectly complementary parts, it would be the appointment of Manish Arora as creative director at Paco Rabanne this season.

headline.main: Paco Rabanne Returns With an Edge
headline.kicker: On the Runway Blog | Fast Fashion
